alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:29AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, south central Valley and southwestern McCone Counties through 230 AM MDT... At 129 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Flowing Wells Rest Area, or 24 miles east of Jordan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jordan, Hell Creek Rec Area, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Rock Creek Rec Area, Brockway, Haxby, Weldon, Watkins and Van Norman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
